name: Abdul-Latif Khusraw
story: Abdul-Latif Khusraw was born into a family of devout Muslims in the middle east. He was educated in both religious and secular subjects, and excelled in his studies. After completing his training, he became a member of the OPFOR army and rose through the ranks due to his exceptional missile skills. Khusraw is respected by his fellow soldiers for his discipline and pragmatic approach to warfare.
